law.catch_line: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, this Part II of this subtitle applies only to ...

text.section:
Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, this Part II of this subtitle applies only to an allowance received by a former member, retiree, or surviving beneficiary of a deceased member, former member, or retiree of:
the Employees' Pension System if the deceased member, former member, or retiree was an employee of a participating governmental unit or a former participating governmental unit, other than Frederick County, that has withdrawn while a member; or
the Local Fire and Police System.

This Part II of this subtitle does not apply to an allowance or portion of an allowance that is:
subject to adjustment under Part II, Part IV, Part V, Part VI, or Part VII of this subtitle; or
based on creditable service earned on or after July 1, 2011.
